data.text: Nnome nka nhyɛsofo kuropɔn
Ɔnyɛ osetie mma obiara
Nʼakannifo yɛ gyata a wɔbobɔ mu,
Ne nkɔmhyɛfo yɛ ahantan;
Awurade a ɔte ne mu no yɛ ɔtreneeni;
“Masɛe amanaman;
Meka kyerɛɛ kuropɔn no se,
Enti twɛn me,” sɛnea Awurade se ni,
“Afei medwira nnipa no ano,
Mʼasomfo, me nkurɔfo a wɔabɔ ahwete no
Saa da no, wo Yerusalem, wɔrengu wʼanim ase
Nanso megyaw wɔ wo mu
Wɔrenyɛ bɔne biara;
To dwom, Ɔbabea Sion;
Efisɛ Awurade ayi wʼasotwe afi wo so,
Saa da no, wɔbɛka akyerɛ Yerusalem se,
Awurade wo Nyankopɔn ne wo wɔ hɔ,
“Meyi wɔn a wodi awerɛhow
Saa bere no me ne wɔn
Saa bere no, mɛboaboa mo ano;
